title: Natural Disaster
dek: On her debut solo album, the Best Coast leader draws inspiration from classic country and glossy pop-rock. It’s the brightest her music has ever sounded but the songwriting doesn’t rise to the occasion.

dek: A previously unknown recording, discovered by chance in 2017, captures the saxophonist testing the limits of his sound in the summer of 1961. It’s a snapshot of a pivotal moment in jazz’s evolution.
